source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_SEQ_00<tab>Lina Mewrilah appears to have been awaiting your arrival for quite some time.
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_SEQ_00<tab>クガネ・ランディング前のリナ・ミュリラーは、冒険者の訪れを待っていたようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_SEQ_01<tab>Alma Lexentale has summoned Lina Mewrilah (and you) to the <var 1A 02 /var>Prima Vista<var 1A 01 /var> to discuss recent findings concerning the auracite. As before, a word with the shuttle pilot will see you quickly and safely to the Lexentale airship.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_SEQ_01前回までの冒険録：
冒険者は、記者リナ・ミュリラーの仲介で帝国から亡命してきた劇団「マジェスティック」の者たちと出会う。彼らの要請で、ラバナスタで行方不明になっていたジェノミス・レクセンテールを救い出すも、真実が記された「デュライ白書」を解読するための手帳と、聖石ドゥマを、盗賊バッガモナン一味に奪われてしまった。ジェノミスは、息子ラムザとともに、イヴァリース伝説から抹消された真実を探し求めているのだと語る。聖石とデュライ白書に関する調査を進め、祖先の名誉を取り戻すのだと誓い合う親子を、娘アルマは不安げに見つめるのだった。
　　　　　　　　　　　　*　*　*
「聖石」について解明できた部分があると、アルマから連絡があったらしい。クガネ・ランディングの「連絡艇の飛空士」に話しかけ、劇場艇プリマビスタの大道具部屋に向かおう。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_SEQ_02<tab>It would seem that Cid has invited an Archon to join him on the <var 1A 02 /var>Prima Vista<var 1A 01 /var>─a Student of Baldesion by the name of Mikoto.
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_SEQ_02<tab>劇場艇プリマビスタで、皆が冒険者の到着を待っているようだ。クガネ・ランディングの「連絡艇の飛空士」に話しかけ、劇場艇プリマビスタの大道具部屋に向かおう。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_SEQ_03<tab>Gamely endeavoring to speak in words of fewer than five syllables, the Archon shares her theories on the auracite, prompting a new debate─if the Otius is not a naturally occurring crystal, then who created it and why? Before a consensus can be reached, Ramza foments new tension with his sister by questioning her commitment to the family mission. It is during this fraternal spat that an uninvited guest enters stage right.
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_SEQ_03<tab>シャーレアンの賢人ミコトから、「聖石」に関する説明を聞いた。「聖石」の声を聞いたというアルマを叱責しようとしたラムザの前に、突如モーグリが現れた。大道具部屋に現れた「モーグリ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_SEQ_04<tab>Seeking admission to their theater company, Montblanc, desert moogle from Dalmasca, petitions the Majestic with all the blustery gusto of a born drama queen. Ramza is quick to dismiss him, but in doing so, inadvertently presents Montblanc with a challenge─slay a beast, and earn apprenticeship aboard the <var 1A 02 /var>Prima Vista<var 1A 01 /var>. Eager to prove his worth, the sorely overmatched and under-armored moogle marches out into the wilds to meet his prey...and most likely his maker.
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_SEQ_04<tab>モーグリ族のモンブランは、劇団マジェスティックへの入団希望者だった。モンブランは、魔物を退治してみせると劇場艇を飛び出していってしまった。大道具部屋で、モンブランの弟の「ハーディ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_SEQ_05<tab>Hurdy and Lina have set off in pursuit of Montblanc. Their first stop? Pier #2.
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_SEQ_05<tab>ハーディとリナ・ミュリラーは、モンブランを探しに出ていった。クガネの第二波止場で「リナ・ミュリラー」、または「ハーディ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_SEQ_06<tab>You learn that Montblanc may have found his way onto a falcon porter bound for the One River in Yanxia. Residents of the Glittering Basin might know more regarding the mole-bat's whereabouts.
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_SEQ_06<tab>ヤンサ地方へ向かう商人の荷物に、モンブランらしき毛玉があったそうだ。ヤンサの無二江流域で「モンブラン」を探そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_SEQ_07<tab>As expected, you find Montblanc in urgent need of rescue, his attempt at slaying a ferocious beast (in this case, a fiery red chocobo) ending just about as well as everyone imagined─that is, in defeat, in case you imagined otherwise.
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_SEQ_07<tab>モンブランを襲っていた<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F21B1F01 /var>を討伐した。無二江流域で「モンブラン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_SEQ_08<tab>Having survived his misguided adventure, Montblanc begins the long journey back to the <var 1A 02 /var>Prima Vista<var 1A 01 /var> in high spirits.
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_SEQ_08<tab>気を取り直したモンブランは劇場艇へと戻っていった。劇場艇プリマビスタの大道具部屋に向かおう。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_SEQ_09<tab>Upon your return, you find the theater barge has visitors─a band of Bangaa, weapons drawn. Only Jenomis might know how to diffuse a situation this volatile.
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_SEQ_09<tab>劇場艇に戻ると、そこにはブワジたちの姿があった。聖石ドゥマを手にしたバッガモナンがどこかへ飛び出していってしまったらしい。大道具部屋の「ジェノミス・レクセンテール」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_SEQ_10<tab>Hostage-taking apart, the Bangaa mean those of the Theater Company no harm, and merely seek aid in locating their missing captain. After hearing their tale, Mikoto believes that there is a chance Ba'Gamnan may have been manipulated by the Duma in the same manner as the late Argath Thadalfus. With no leads, however, the captain's rescue seems impossible...until Jenomis discovers a mysterious addition on the final page of his journal. Intent on discovering its significance, he returns at once to his research, promising to send for you as soon as the riddle is solved.
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_SEQ_10<tab>ジェノミスは、手帳に書かれていた「リドルアナ」という言葉について調べてみるという。彼らの調査が終わるまで、しばらく待っているよう頼まれた。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Where in the world have you been? Did you not receive Alma's summons? Principal Lexentale's research into the auracite may finally have borne fruit!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_000あ、待ってましたよ、冒険者さん！
例の「聖石」の謎がちょっとだけ解明できたかもしれないって、
アルマちゃんから連絡があったんです！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_001<tab>We must hurry to the <var 1A 02 /var>Prima Vista<var 1A 01 /var> before they embark on some grand and perilous adventure without us!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_001早速、劇場艇プリマビスタへ移動しましょう。
皆さん？　お待ちかねみたいですよ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_010<tab>In her message, Alma mentioned a guest from Sharlayan. Someone your companion Cid Garlond believed might be able to assist the Principal's research. An “archetype,” I think is the term she used.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_010シドさんが、えっと……「シャーレアンの変人」さん？
あれ……なんか違うな……？
と、とにかく、エーテルに詳しい方をお呼びしたようですよ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_AIRSHIPGUIDE03003_000_020<tab>If you would follow me to the shuttle, good <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((sir)) /var>.
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_AIRSHIPGUIDE03003_000_020<tab>劇場艇プリマビスタの「大道具部屋」に移動なさいますか？

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_Q1_000_000<tab>Board the <var 1A 02 /var>Prima Vista<var 1A 01 /var>?
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_Q1_000_000<tab>「大道具部屋」へ移動しますか？

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_ALMALEXENTALE_000_100<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Lady Mewrilah. Thank you for answering my summons. Master Garlond was kind enough to send for an Archon from Sharlayan, and I thought it only right that you be present to hear her findings.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_ALMALEXENTALE_000_100お呼び立てして申し訳ございません。
「聖石」の調査のために、シャーレアンの賢人様を、
シドおじさまからご紹介いただきました。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_CID_000_101<tab>To be frank, summoning Mikoto was more Y'shtola's idea. I simply came along to see what light she could shed on this mystery.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_CID_000_101……というより、ヤ・シュトラたちに頼んだだけなんだがな。
紹介しよう、
こちらがシャーレアンの賢人のミコトだ。

source:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_102I am Mikoto of House Jinba─a Doman, though my years in Sharlayan have made me a stranger here. You must be ─fabled liberator of men. Slayer of false gods. Warrior of Light...
I thought you'd be taller.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_102はじめまして、私はジンバのミコト。
がこの地の解放者にしてエオルゼアの英雄、
「超える力を持つ者」……ですね。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_103<tab>Let us speak of the crystal.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_103早速ですが、私の見解をご説明しましょう。
この聖石…………

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_104<tab>Ahem...
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_104<tab>ゴホン……

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_100_104<tab>The <var 1A 02 /var>Otius<var 1A 01 /var>─one of but many <var 1A 02 /var>auracite<var 1A 01 /var> shards that aided noble Delita's rise to regent.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_100_104オティス……聖石オティスだ。
英雄王ディリータが集めたとされる聖石のひとつだ。
どうやら私が発掘した聖石はそれらしい。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_105<tab>My apologies. The <var 1A 02 /var>Otius<var 1A 01 /var> is no ordinary crystal, even discounting its obvious historical importance. The specimen is more than a simple manifestation of elementally aspected energies─it is, rather, an aetherial lodestone whose facilitation of both the absorption and transmission of distinct-frequency NRR<var 1F /var>type harmonic vibrations has been observed to promote aetherial amplification.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_105この聖石オティスと呼ばれるクリスタルですが、
特定周波であるNRレイデール振動をエーテルごと吸収し、
クリスタル内で増幅し続けるという特性があります。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_106<tab>The resultant neuro-harmonic disturbance allows for a highly unique emittance of CPRS waves that, instead of radiating outward with a determinate factor of dispersal, instead resonate <var 1A 02 /var>inward<var 1A 01 /var> at a frequency so labored, my estimates place the rate of VRT decay at upwards of several <var 1A 02 /var>centuries<var 1A 01 /var>...though I must admit I lack sufficient variates to complete a truly comprehensive graphical assessment.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_106すぐに拡散するはずのシプレス波が固定されているのも珍しく、
バリアーテスを数百年単位でレンドしているのは驚愕ものです。
おそらく、これを作った何者かは……

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_CID_000_107<tab>...Hmph. While that explanation may elicit admiring nods from your professors at the academy, it will earn you only blank looks here. Take a deep breath and try again─this time in a language those of us <var 1A 02 /var>without<var 1A 01 /var> the Echo might comprehend.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_CID_000_107ちょ、ちょっと待ってくれ。
専門用語が多すぎてさっぱりだ。
シロウトにもわかるように解説してくれないか。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_108<tab>My apologies. I merely thought─
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_108スミマセン、私、興奮するとつい専門的になっちゃうんですよね。
教授からも注意するようにきつく言われているのですが。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_CID_000_109<tab>Apologies will see us no nearer to an answer. A simpler explanation will.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_CID_000_109気にしなくていい。
さぁ、詳しく、そして理解しやすいよう説明してくれ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_110<tab>Simpler... Right... Um... Aether is not only the building block of all things material, but those immaterial as well. Thoughts, memories, feelings, one's very will are all understood to be aetherial phenomena, and can be measured as such. Unlike most crystals, which only can emit elemental energies, auracite is tuned not only to absorb aether, but aether specific to the immaterial. That aether is then stored and multiplied within its crystalline confines until external stimuli precipitate release.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_110こ、この聖石オティスですが、え～と、なんて言えばいいのか、
……そう、人の感情や意思といったエーテルを吸収し増幅、
そしてそれを外部からの刺激で再生するという特性があります。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_CID_000_111<tab>Try again.
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_CID_000_111<tab>つまり……？

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_112<tab>Uh... Ahem. Under appropriate conditions, a strong will or desire can become imprinted upon the auracite and stored until fomentation, at which time the desire becomes manifest─
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_112え～と、強い意志を……「切なる願い」を吸収し、それを保存、
そして、外部からの刺激があると、その保存された意志を、
物理的に具現化する……と言えばおわかりになりますか？

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_113<tab>Fomen...tation?
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_113<tab>「切なる願い」を吸収……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_CID_000_114<tab>What my studious young friend is <var 1A 02 /var>trying<var 1A 01 /var> to say is that the Otius takes one's deepest fantasies and makes them reality.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_CID_000_114このクリスタルはそれを利用する者の深層心理、
心の奥深くに眠る「願望」を取り込み、
さらにその「願望」を具現化することができるということか。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_115<tab>Ah. Yes. Yes, that is...simpler. You...may choose to think of it as a process akin to that of summoning a primal.
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_115<tab>神降ろしを行うのと、さしたる違いはないですね。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_116<tab>There being one marked difference─primal summoning requires a supplemental energy source, such as a hoard of elementally charged crystals. Auracite, on the other hand, has the capacity to serve as its own source of power.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_116ただ、「神降ろし」はクリスタルをそのエネルギー源としますが、
「聖石」は、利用者の願いをこのクリスタルそのものが、
能動的に具現化しようとする点で大きく異なります。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_117<tab>We know from the Durai Papers that Argath was never king of Ivalice. He was slain in battle during the War of the Lions.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_117アルガスがイヴァリースの王であったと言う事実は、
少なくともデュライ白書には記されていない。
獅子戦争の最中に戦死した……とだけだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_118<tab>Yet the Argath encountered during the recent expedition carried himself as if he had been crowned regent. I believe this was merely the auracite in his possession making manif─uh, realizing his desire to rule.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_118がルザリアで聞いたという、
まるで王であるかのようなアルガス氏の言葉や不遜な態度は、
氏自身の願望……「切なる願い」なのでしょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_119<tab>I am informed that he uttered the same words over and over again for the duration of the confrontation which unfolded. If that is the case, it is possible that it was not actually Argath who uttered them, but the auracite itself.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_119まるで壊れた蓄音機のように同じ言葉を繰り返すのは、
聖石ドゥマに取り込まれたアルガス氏の「切なる願い」だけを、
ひたすら再生してるにすぎないからだと推測されます。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_CID_000_120<tab>If the Durai Papers are accurate, Argath was a weak and petty noble who believed that his blood entitled him to power. The auracite took that belief and twisted it into the abomination we─uh, <var 1A 02 /var><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1A 01 /var> put to the sword.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_CID_000_120なるほど、それなら、色々と合点がいくな……。
自分の非力さを嘆き、「力」を求めた結果、
異形の者へと姿を変えたというわけか。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_ALMALEXENTALE_000_121<tab>Then you are saying the crystal could prove a threat?
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_ALMALEXENTALE_000_121<tab>やっぱり、この聖石は危険なクリスタルなんですね……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_122<tab>The <var 1A 02 /var>auracite<var 1A 01 /var>, Alma. And not necessarily. Ramza seemed to fare well enough. There is no record of the young regent being manipulated by the artifacts he gathered.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_122い、いや、デュライ白書によると、
ラムザらは聖石の力を使って、亡くなったばかりの者の命を、
取り戻したとも記されているんだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_123<tab>In the hands of the just, the auracite should prove harmless, even beneficial!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_123ミコトさんの分析が間違っていないのであれば、
利用する者の意思、つまり正しい使い方さえすれば、
聖石は必ずしも脅威だけとはいえないはず……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_CID_000_124<tab>To paraphrase: “It is not the weapon that kills, but the one who wields it”?
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_CID_000_124<tab>「使う者」次第ってわけか。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_CID_100_124<tab>Now where have I heard that before...
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_CID_100_124ふんっ……まるで危険な魔導兵器を作っておきながら、
平和目的に使用するなら危険ではないと言っていた、
俺たちガレアン族のようだな、皮肉なもんだぜ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_CID_000_125<tab>Oh, yes. It was Emperor Galvus's justification for taking the marvels of magitek and applying them to the manufacture of arms. Where, after all, was the harm if it allowed him to “bring order” to the Three Great Continents?
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_CID_000_125<tab>む……待てよ、ということは……？

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_126<tab>You draw an intriguing parallel, Master Garlond... The properties of these crystals are so singular, I do begin to wonder if they, like magitek, are products of <var 1A 02 /var>science<var 1A 01 /var> and not nature. That they were created by someone to─
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_126シドさんの推測どおりです。
このクリスタルは自然にできたものではありません。
何者かが意思を持って人工的に作り出したシロモノです……！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_ALMALEXENTALE_000_127<tab>But who? What manner of person would even be capable of such a feat?
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_ALMALEXENTALE_000_127<tab>そんな……いったい誰がこんな危険なものを……？

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_CID_000_128<tab>Now <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> is an interesting question─the answer to which I look forward to hearing. Regrettably, I have pressing matters to attend to elsewhere. Fear not, however: Mikoto's insight will prove far more beneficial than anything I might accidentally contribute. Good day to you all.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_CID_000_128悪いがあとは任せるぜ。
やり残してる仕事がたくさんあってな……。
すまんが、よろしく頼む。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_129<tab>What I don't understand is...
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_129<tab>あの～～ぉ、あたし、ちょっと気になるんですけど～。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_130<tab>If the Duma was imprinted with Argath's deepest desires, then whose desires are rattling about inside the Otius?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_130聖石ドゥマにはアルガスさんの「切なる願い」が、
詰まっていたんですよね～～？
としたら、この聖石オティスには誰の「切なる願い」が？

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_131<tab>I had the selfsame question, and thus conducted a thorough inspection of the crystal upon my arrival. The results were...inconclusive. Traces of aetherial activity were present, but to all intents and purposes, the vessel was empty.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_131ご安心を……調べたところ、その聖石は空です。
わずかなエーテルの残滓があったので調べることが
できましたけど、おおむね空といって間違いありません。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_ALMALEXENTALE_000_132<tab>Empty? But what of the voices I heard?
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_ALMALEXENTALE_000_132<tab>ほんとですか？　以前、声を聞いたことが……

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_133<tab>Voices? I heard nothing of the sort. The only voices you heard, Alma, were in your stubborn head!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_133バカなことを言うんじゃない、アルマ！
そんな声、聞いたことなんて一度もないぞ、ボクは！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_ALMALEXENTALE_000_134<tab>Ramza, why won't you─
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_ALMALEXENTALE_000_134<tab>に、兄さん……

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_135<tab>Shall we speak of “voices,” then? What of yours, Alma? Our resident voice of dissent. You have done naught but question the wisdom of our research from the moment we left Garlemald. Would you put your petty worries above our family's calling?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_135おまえがこの調査を嫌っているのは知っている。
だが、この行為は我々レクセンテール家の……
いや、デュライ家の悲願なのは分かっているだろうッ？

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_ALMALEXENTALE_000_136<tab>No! I would never─
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_ALMALEXENTALE_000_136<tab>ごめんなさい、兄さん……

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_137<tab>You would never!? Then why involve a gossipmonger, a goody two-shoes, and this...this...flying mole!?
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_137<tab>だいたい、おまえは…………

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_100_137<tab>Please tell me you can see that.
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_100_137<tab>え？？？

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_150<tab>A moogle! And a decidedly dusty one at that! Might this be one of <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> acquaintances, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_150あら、ビックリ！
モーグリさんがいったい何の用なんでしょう？
……それにしても、埃っぽいモーグリさんですね。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_155<tab>Most intriguing... Is it alive?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_155……あの不思議な毛玉はいったい？
動いているようだが、生命体なのか？

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_160<tab>Don't just stand there, get rid of the thing! You're the liberator. Liberate this vessel of that pest!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_160……どこから入ってきたんだ？
突然、出現したように思えるのだけど？？
そもそも、コレは……生き物？

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_ALMALEXENTALE_000_165<tab>It's like nothing I have ever seen before... Can we keep it?
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_ALMALEXENTALE_000_165<tab>……モフモフしたい。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_170<tab>Ah. A moogle. Yes.
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_170<tab>……綿菓子を食べたくなりました。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MONTBLANC_000_300<tab>Am I interrupting? Oh, please <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> go on. My acceptance into your fine troupe's ranks can wait until all have said their piece, kupo.
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MONTBLANC_000_300<tab>モグは歌って踊れる舞台俳優になりたいクポ～！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_301<tab>Guards! Get this, this, this─
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_301<tab>き、貴様は………？

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MONTBLANC_000_302<tab>(-Montblanc-)Montblanc. The name is Montblanc. Denizen of Dalmasca's deserts, seeker of thrills, adventurer extraordinaire. But you may call me Montblanc, kupo.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MONTBLANC_000_302(-モンブラン-)モグはモーグリのモンブラン！
ダルマスカの冒険者だクポ～！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_303<tab>Dalmasca has long been known as a melting pot for myriad cultures─where minor races such as the Seeq, the Bangaa, and the Viera might live in relative harmony with Hyur, Elezen, and others.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_303ダルマスカ王国ではヒューランなどのヒトだけでなく、
バンガ族やシーク族、ヴィエラ族らが「蛮族」として扱われず、
生活を共にしていたと聞きますが……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_304<tab>Yet there is no record of a prominent moogle population.
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_304<tab>モーグリ族がいたというのは初耳ですね……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MONTBLANC_000_305<tab>(-Montblanc-)Most likely because we are neither prominent nor populous! My people are nomadic by nature, ever drawn to the elusive frontier and the freedom she promises, kupo!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MONTBLANC_000_305(-モンブラン-)流浪のモーグリ族クポ～～！
モグの祖先はモーグリの中でも冒険好きな一派らしいクポ。
フロンティア精神に満ちあふれる血が流れているクポ～！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_306<tab>A...moogle?
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_306<tab>これが……モーグリ族……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MONTBLANC_000_307<tab>(-Montblanc-)Of course I'm a moogle, kupo. You'd think the adorable wings and the fluffy pom would have given it away. Now, about my admission to the Majestic─
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MONTBLANC_000_307(-モンブラン-)そんなわけで、モグを劇団マジェスティックの一員に、
加えてほしいクポ～。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_308<tab>I will allow no such thing! The Majestic is the Empire's premier theater company. We will not sully its good name by granting refuge to a fluttering ball of fur!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_308何をバカなことを！
ボクらマジェスティックは帝国随一の演劇集団。
帝国人どころか人間でもない貴様が入れるわけないだろうッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_309<tab>And furthermore, how in the world did this abomination board the <var 1A 02 /var>Prima Vista<var 1A 01 /var> in the first place!?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_309許可を与えていないのに劇場艇に侵入したかと思えば、
舞台俳優だって？　ハッ、まったく笑えるヤツだよ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_310<tab>By means of his <var 1A 02 /var>wings<var 1A 01 /var>, were I to guess. As for his admission to our company, I do not seem to recall race, creed, or allegiance on <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> list of prerequisites, do you?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_310やめなさい、ラムザ。
文化の力に国境も種族も関係ないと言っているだろう？

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_311<tab>...No, Father.
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_311<tab>…………。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_312<tab>Very well, then. Montblanc, what is it exactly that calls you to the stage─our stage?
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_312<tab>モンブランくん、きみはどうして舞台俳優になりたいんだい？

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MONTBLANC_000_313<tab>(-Montblanc-)What else? <var 1A 02 /var>The Zodiac Brave Story<var 1A 01 /var>, kupo! Never before have I witnessed something so amazing. So moving.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MONTBLANC_000_313(-モンブラン-)以前、ガレマール帝国まで足を延ばした際、
皇都で「ゾディアックブレイブ・ストーリー」を観たクポ！
ものすっごく感動したクポ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MONTBLANC_000_314<tab>(-Montblanc-)Sitting─well, technically <var 1A 02 /var>hovering<var 1A 01 /var> there in the audience as the story unfolded around me...I knew I was witnessing something special. Something positively transcendental, kupo! It was then that I realized I either had to be a part of it...or go to my grave a bitter and broken moogle.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MONTBLANC_000_314(-モンブラン-)以来、モグは俳優になってディリータを演りたいクポ！
お願いクポ！　お願いクポ！
モグを一流の俳優に育ててほしいクポ～ッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_HURDY_000_315<tab>Was this realization before or after you swore you simply had to become the realm's greatest marauder, kupo!?
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_HURDY_000_315<tab>(-新たなモーグリ-)なぁに言っているクポ～～ッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MONTBLANC_000_316<tab>(-Montblanc-)Hurdy!? How did you─
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MONTBLANC_000_316(-モンブラン-)ハーディ！？
ど、どうしてここにいるクポ？？

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_HURDY_000_317<tab>Perhaps you'd have more success at running away if you didn't reveal your grand designs to every other fool you happen to meet, kupo.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_HURDY_000_317兄ちゃんはモグたち一族に伝わる美しい言葉、
「初志貫徹」を忘れたクポ？

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_HURDY_000_318<tab>Was it not but two score nights ago you took up the axe, kupo!? Now here you are professing your passion for the stage before carving even a single notch in your haft? Do you not remember, “to he who churns the butter goes the sweetest bread”?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_HURDY_000_318戦士になると言いながら斧術の稽古はそっちのけ、
試練として与えられた魔物討伐も無視して逃亡、
そんな中途半端な人生でいいクポ～～ッ！？

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MONTBLANC_000_319<tab>(-Montblanc-)But how is one to savor said buttered bread if his head is in the belly of a fearsome beast? You accuse me of giving up when I merely came to the realization that continuing would end in failure. Only through a change of course could I reach my final destination, kupo.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MONTBLANC_000_319(-モンブラン-)……魔物はとても恐ろしいクポ。
モグの力では倒すことなんてできないクポ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_HURDY_000_320<tab>And that destination is what? Mummer? Are you sure it is not geomancer? Arithmetician? Templar? Do not bother answering, kupo─we all know you'll be singing a different tune come cockcrow!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_HURDY_000_320だからって、舞台俳優？？
兄ちゃんの夢はどこに棄てたクポ？？
そんなことじゃ俳優も途中で諦めるに違いないクポ～ッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MONTBLANC_000_321<tab>(-Montblanc-)That is where you are mistaken, Hurdy. I was destined to be a thespian! I can feel it in my fur. The role of Delita was made for me! Made for me, kupo!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MONTBLANC_000_321(-モンブラン-)そ、そんなことないクポ！
俳優こそ、モグが目指すにふさわしいジョブクポ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_322<tab>Kupo kupo kupo kupo! Enough!
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_322<tab>クポクポ、五月蠅いんだよ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_323<tab>The actors in our company trained at the Empire's finest institutes. They represent the pinnacle of the profession not only in Garlemald, but across the entire world.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_323モーグリだかなんだか知らないが、
帝国市民でもない貴様に、いや人間ですらない蛮族に、
演劇の何がわかるというんだッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_324<tab>A vagrant <var 1A 02 /var>bat-mole<var 1A 01 /var> like you could never hope to share a stage with such artists, let alone play the part of a hero like Delita! You yourself admitted you were too craven to face a solitary beast─how do you imagine you would fare against a pack of theater critics!? Any troupe would need proof of valor before it could even consider─
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_324たとえ演技ができたとしても、
英雄ディリータは戦場で剣を振るった歴戦の勇者。
魔物の1体も倒せぬ「毛玉」にできるものかッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MONTBLANC_000_325<tab>(-Montblanc-)Craven!? Call me a cheat and call me cur, but do not, sir, call me craven! I accept your challenge: slay but one foul beast by mine own hand, and the Majestic Theater Company will accept me into its ranks, kupo.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MONTBLANC_000_325(-モンブラン-)クッポ～～ッ！！！
わかったクポッ！
だったら、モグが魔物を倒してくるクポッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_326<tab>Wait, I issued no such─
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_326<tab>フンッ、やれるものか！？

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MONTBLANC_000_327<tab>(-Montblanc-)You are all here witnesses, kupo! When I return with the head of a terrible beast in my gore-stained hands, you will be honor-bound to welcome me, Montblanc the Mummer, into the fabled ranks of the Majestic! Good day!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MONTBLANC_000_327(-モンブラン-)ラバナスタで魔物退治したと聞いたクポ！
モグも倒してくるクポ！
待ってるクポ～～ッ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_HURDY_000_328<tab>Wonderful. What do we do now?
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_HURDY_000_328<tab>……行ってしまったクポ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_329<tab>What do <var 1A 02 /var>we<var 1A 01 /var> do? <var 1A 02 /var>We<var 1A 01 /var> do nothing. If that bat-mole wishes to throw himself on the horns of a stampeding dzo, I will not stand in his way.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_329すぐに戻ってくるさ。
いや、ネズミ1匹倒せぬおのれを恥じて、
住処に帰るんじゃ？　ハハハッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_330<tab>I believe the proper term of derogation is “mole-bat,” and I should warn you: moogles do not take kindly to those who use it.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_330モーグリ族にとって「毛玉」呼ばわりされるのは、
最大の侮辱のはず……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_ALMALEXENTALE_000_331<tab>Why must you always put yourself above others, Brother? Did you learn nothing from Argath's wretched example?
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_ALMALEXENTALE_000_331<tab>兄さんったら、ホントにもう！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_HURDY_000_332<tab>Montblanc would never have set off on this fool's errand had you not made the challenge. If anything befalls my brother, his blood will be on your hands!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_HURDY_000_332兄ちゃんを……モンブラン兄ちゃんを追ってほしいクポ！
怒髪天な兄ちゃんは何をしでかすか……。
魔物退治に行って死んだらどうしようクポ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_ALMALEXENTALE_000_333<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... You are the only one among us capable of locating Montblanc and preventing disaster. On behalf of my brother, I beg your assistance.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_ALMALEXENTALE_000_333冒険者さん、お願いです！
モンブランさんを止めてください！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_335<tab>However did Ramza come to be so thoroughly obnoxious? He and his sister couldn't be more different.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_335ラムザくんもホント、大人げないですね。
性格の悪さが顔に出ちゃってますよ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_336<tab>Moogles are prominent players in Ivalician legend, but none of the tales mention their capacity for flight. Something lost in translation, perhaps?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_336あれがモーグリという生命体か。
イヴァリースにも同じ名の種族がいたようだが、
空中を浮かぶことはできなかったようだから関係なさそうだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_337<tab>I...I apologize. I must learn to control my anger. But sometimes...it can be difficult.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_337すみません、お見苦しいところを……。
あそこまで言うつもりもなかったのですが、つい……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_ALMALEXENTALE_000_338<tab>You saw the poor moogle. He won't last a day on his own. You must find him and bring him back! I beg of you!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_ALMALEXENTALE_000_338冒険者さん、お願いします！
モンブランさんを捜して、連れ戻してください！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_HURDY_000_340<tab>My brother can be rather...simpleminded when it comes to such matters. Thinking to impress the Warrior of Light and <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> companions, Montblanc would likely choose the scene of your recent exploits to prove his worth─meaning Rabanastre, if I am not mistaken.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_HURDY_000_340兄ちゃん、きっと、ラバナスタへ向かったクポ。
冒険者さんの活躍を聞いてるから絶対にそこクポ～！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_341<tab>Pardon my language, but that Ramza really is an incurable little prick, is he not? How dare he speak to his sister and the moogle in that manner. I couldn't decide which was worse─the things he said, or the way the principal sat back and let him say them.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_341ったく、どっちもガキンチョで意地っ張りですね……。
仕方ないので捜しに行きましょうか。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_342<tab>But I suppose it is none of our concern. For now, let us concentrate on the task at hand─finding that moogle before he does something we'll all regret. What say we start nearby. Pier Two, perhaps?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_342ダルマスカ地方へ向かおうとする飛空艇なんて、
この劇場艇以外ないでしょう。
ですので、とりあえず、第二波止場で話を聞いてみますか。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_430<tab>The falcon porter tells us that he set a traveling blacksmith away to Yanxia not a bell past. And why would that be of interest to us, you ask?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_430面白い目撃情報がありましたよ。
商人が大隼屋を乗り継いでヤンサ地方へ向かったようなんですが、
その荷物の中に「白くてフワフワした毛玉」があったとか！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_431<tab>Because said peddler of iron and steel was seen to be carrying a bag stuffed to the brim with, and I quote, “albino mole fur and purple bat wings”!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_431珍しい商品を扱っているなと思って商人に話しかけようとしたら、
出発してしまったとか。
きっと、モンブランくんですね、その毛玉！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_HURDY_000_432<tab>Montblanc!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_HURDY_000_432け、毛玉は…………モグたちにとって最大の侮辱……
って、もういいクポ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_HURDY_000_433<tab>...Not that we look like that, kupo!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_HURDY_000_433きっと、ダルマスカに隣接している辺りまで行ったに違いないクポ！
……ぼ、冒険者さん、ヤンサへ向かうクポ～～！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_434<tab>The quickest route into Dalmasca is via the One River and its western tributaries. If Montblanc is bound for Rabanastre, he will seek passage from the Glittering Basin.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_434ダルマスカに隣接している辺りというと無二江流域ですね。
無二江流域の船着場へ行ってみましょうか。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_HURDY_000_500<tab>Montblanc! What were you thinking!?
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_HURDY_000_500<tab>兄ちゃん、大丈夫クポ！？

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_501<tab>Have you any idea what you put your brother through!? He has been worried sick!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_501もう無茶しちゃって！
死んじゃったらすべてオジャンなのよっ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MONTBLANC_000_502<tab>Both Hurdy and Ramza were right all along. I am a failure. A flop. A flailing flapping foppish failure, kupo. How could <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> play the part of a hero if I cannot even ruffle the feathers of a single measly bird. The audience would see right through me like the spineless jellyfish I am.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MONTBLANC_000_502ごめんクポ……
モグの力じゃ魔物なんて退治できないクポ……。
やっぱり舞台俳優は無理な夢クポ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_503<tab>Now wait, Montblanc. Not everyone can be a hero...not even most heroes! Yes, the bards sing of the man who deals the final blow, but what of his cadre of loyal companions? Do you think Delita united Ivalice on his own? Do you think <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> here was alone when <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> liberated Ala Mhigo?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_503ラムザくんの言ったことなんて、まったく気にする必要ないから！
だいたい、ディリータだってひとりで敵を倒したわけじゃないし。
解放者さんだってそうでしょ？

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_Q2_000_000<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_A2_000_001<tab>You're never alone on the battlefield.
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_A2_000_001<tab>アラミゴやドマの解放は皆で力を合わせた結果だ

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_A2_000_002<tab>Not all wars are won on the front lines.
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_A2_000_002<tab>経験がないなら見識を広げて想像力で補おう

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MONTBLANC_000_510<tab>Never alone...? So you're saying you'll always be there for me? For Montblanc?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MONTBLANC_000_510冒険者さんが噂の英雄なのクポ？
……モグはまだ若輩者クポ。
独り立ちできるまでは仲間のみんなにいっぱい頼るクポ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_HURDY_000_511<tab>Uh... I think <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> was speaking metaphorically...
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_HURDY_000_511<tab>兄ちゃんの中ではすでに仲間なんだクポ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MONTBLANC_000_515<tab>But of course they are not! Every campaign needs its brilliant architect─the mastermind who moves the pieces across the board! <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var>, Montblanc, can be that mastermind!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MONTBLANC_000_515妄想なら得意クポ！！　特技といってもいいクポ～！
それならいつだってモグは一流の戦士クポ～～！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_HURDY_000_516<tab>That was quick...
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_HURDY_000_516<tab>兄ちゃんの特技はその立ち直りの早さだと思うクポ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_530<tab>Let us not dwell on the details. The day is saved, and Montblanc has escaped sans scratch or singe to show for it. We should return to the <var 1A 02 /var>Prima Vista<var 1A 01 /var> before our luck runs out.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_530何事も気楽が一番よ！
さぁ、アルマちゃんが心配してるわ。
劇場艇へ戻りましょう！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_600<tab>Please! This ship is a place of peace!
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_600<tab>待てッ！　皆、落ち着くんだ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_601<tab>Release my sister or you will answer to me!
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_601<tab>アルマを解放しろッ！　さもなくば、貴様たちを！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_602<tab>When the cat's away...
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_602え？？？
どういうこと？？
まさかの劇場艇占拠事件発生？？？

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_603<tab>Put that damnable thing down, Ramza. You're not helping matters!
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_603<tab>ラムザ、剣を置きなさい！！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_BWAGI_000_604<tab>We have no quarrel with you or yours. We only seek aid in finding our leader, Ba'Gamnan.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_BWAGI_000_604待ってくれィ！　オレたちは戦いにきたんじゃナイ！
兄貴を……バッガモナンの兄貴を助けてほしいンだ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_605<tab>You seek our help!? You who threatened to kill my father? Who stole his work and made fools of us all!? Never!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_605白々しい嘘を！！
どうせここから逃げることはできないんだ！
さぁ、諦めてアルマを放すんだ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_606<tab>Silence, Ramza! They have Alma. We will hear what they have to say.
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_606<tab>どういう意味だ？　説明するんだ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_BWAGI_000_607<tab>As I said, we have no quarrel with you. We only did what was necessary to secure an audience. We surrender our weapons and offer your journal as an act of good faith.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_BWAGI_000_607わかった！　大人しくするから、乱暴はやめてくれ……！
それに手帳をアンタらに返すから！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_608<tab>...This is all rather a lot to digest. But your claims do coincide with what we have learned about the auracite.
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_608<tab>……なるほど、聖石ドゥマのせいだと言うのだな？

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_GIJUK_000_609<tab>You're saying that crystal did something to our captain?
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_GIJUK_000_609<tab>あのクリスタルは、いったい何なンだよォ！？

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_610<tab>After being emptied of Argath's will, the Duma sought that of another to sate its appetite for aether.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_610封印されたアルガスのエーテルを吐き出した聖石ドゥマが、
その「容れ物」を満たすべく、
バッガモナン氏に狙いを定めた……ということでしょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RINOK_000_611<tab>You're saying that crystal <var 1A 02 /var>ate<var 1A 01 /var> our captain!?
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RINOK_000_611<tab>どういう意味だイ？？

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_612<tab>Not his body, no. Only his soul.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_612聖石と呼ばれるあのクリスタルは、
常に誰かの、「特定」のエーテルを欲しがっているんです。
ドゥマはバッガモナン氏の魂を食べようとしている……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RINOK_000_613<tab>His <var 1A 02 /var>soul<var 1A 01 /var>!?
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RINOK_000_613<tab>なんてこったイ……！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_614<tab>Tell me...what in your opinion was your leader's deepest desire? What was it that he longed for above all else in the world?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_614ひとつ教えてくれないか？
バッガモナンの心の奥底に眠る願望ってヤツを……。
おまえたちなら知っているのだろう？

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_615<tab>Why waste your breath reasoning with these...these...<var 1A 02 /var>lizards<var 1A 01 /var>? They showed themselves for the beasts they are when they put a knife to your throat!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_615ほっときましょうよ、こんな連中！
ラバナスタで父さんをひどい目に遭わせた盗賊ですよ！
こんなトカゲなんてさっさと追い出すべきですよ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MONTBLANC_000_616<tab>First mole-bats, now lizards? This one's tongue is pure poison.
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MONTBLANC_000_616<tab>……バンガにトカゲは禁句クポ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_BWAGI_000_617<tab>The boy can call us what he pleases. For our past failings, we deserve no better.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_BWAGI_000_617……昔のオレたちなら、侮辱には銃弾で返したモンだが、
あの一件以来、誹られることを甘ンずるようになったのサ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_618<tab>Your failings?
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_618<tab>あの一件？

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_GIJUK_000_619<tab>Thirty summers have come and gone...yet not a night goes by that I do not wake in sweat at the memory.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_GIJUK_000_619もう30年近く前の話になるカナ。
オレたちがまだ若造だった頃の話サ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RINOK_000_620<tab>We were fusiliers in the Dalmascan army, stationed in the royal stronghold at Nalbina.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RINOK_000_620こう見えてもネ、アタイたちは、
ダルマスカ王国の銃士隊に所属した銃士だったのヨ。
だけど、ナルビナ城塞の陥落で……

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_621<tab>Nalbina Fortress was reputed to be impenetrable. Its fall to the IVth Legion proved a turning point in the imperial campaign, dealing a crushing blow to Dalmascan morale and ultimately marking the beginning of the kingdom's end.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_621……第IV軍団が落とした難攻不落の城塞か。
たしか、あの攻城戦での敗北が契機となって、
ダルマスカ王国は滅亡への道を歩み始めたと記憶が。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_BWAGI_000_622<tab>Ba'Gamnan was our captain, and once it was clear the day would not be ours, Prince Rasler, commander of the garrison at Nalbina, tasked him with one final mission.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_BWAGI_000_622兄貴は銃士隊の隊長でな……。
オレたちの小隊はナルビナの指揮官だったラスラ王子から、
ひとつの任務を受けていた。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_BWAGI_000_623<tab>Our unit was to escort His Highness's twin sister, the Princess Ashelia, away from the fortress and thence to safety. But...things did not go as planned...
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_BWAGI_000_623双子の妹であられるアーシェ王女を密かに城塞から逃がす、
それがオレたちの任務だったンダ。
だが、失敗した……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_GIJUK_000_624<tab>I still remember the words she uttered as she lay dying in the captain's arms but a stone's throw from where the Garamsythe Waterway drains into the sea.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_GIJUK_000_624ガラムサイズ水路で王女様は亡くなる前にこう言ったンダ。
オレたちに「生きてくれ」と……。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_GIJUK_000_625<tab>Even as the fog of death descended upon her, she smiled and told us─the very people who had failed her─to survive, for as long as even a single Dalmascan stood, our nation would never truly perish.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_GIJUK_000_625王を失い国を失ったとしても、民が生きているかぎり、
ダルマスカの誇りは失われないとな。
王女様は微笑みながら兄貴の腕の中で冷たくなったのサ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RINOK_000_626<tab>But it should not have been us who survived. By failing to protect our charge, we betrayed the princess and her memory, and brought shame upon our race. So yes, we are naught but cold-blooded lizards deserving of whatever scorn you deign to heap on us.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RINOK_000_626それ以来、兄貴もアタイたちもただのトカゲ。
バンガの風上にも置けない、くそったれなトカゲなんだヨ。
アハハハハハハハ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_627<tab>Hmm... I think we may safely assume a deep-seated hatred towards the invaders of his homeland, coupled with self-loathing born from a sense of powerlessness.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_627なるほど、バッガモナン氏の「切なる願い」とはすなわち、
己の不甲斐なさを責め続ける自責の念と、
祖国を滅亡に追いやった帝国に対する遺恨……ですね。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_628<tab>The darkness that lurks in the heart of Ba'Gamnan is little different from that which drove Argath─the selfsame emotions that were to nourish the Duma.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_628アルガス氏と差異があったとしても基本は同じ。
聖石は似たエーテルを取り込もうとする傾向を持つという推測、
やはり当たっているようですね。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_BWAGI_000_629<tab>Stop speaking in riddles, Sharlayan.
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_BWAGI_000_629<tab>それはつまり……どういうことなンダ？

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_630<tab>She's saying your <var 1A 02 /var>brave captain<var 1A 01 /var> will eventually turn into a monster...or rather, more of one.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_630貴様たちも見ただろう？
ラバナスタの深部……王都ルザリア遺跡に現れた、
アルガスという名の異形の者を！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_GIJUK_000_631<tab>Garlean lies!
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_GIJUK_000_631兄貴がああなっちまうってことカイ！？
ふざけんな、テメェ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_632<tab>What they say is true. If we do not find Ba'Gamnan and the Duma soon, none of us are safe, present company included.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_632そうなる前に止めないと駄目だってことよ。
もぅ、すぐにカッカするのはヤメテ～！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_633<tab>Do you have any idea where he might have gone? Any at all?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_633それで、バッガモナンさんがどこへ行ったのか、
あなたたち、心当たりはないの？

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_634<tab>Wait, look at this! Something has been added to the final page of my journal!
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_634<tab>見てくれ、新たに書き込まれた文字が手帳に……！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_BWAGI_000_635<tab>Then the captain must have put it there. Only he had access to it─until we found it in the pack he left behind, that is.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_BWAGI_000_635兄貴しか触ってネェからな、その手帳。
書き込むとしたら兄貴に間違いネェゼ！

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_636<tab>Is this...Dalmascan?
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_636<tab>ダルマスカ語？　なんて書いてあるのよ？

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MONTBLANC_000_637<tab>Indeed it is! It says “Ridorana.”
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MONTBLANC_000_637<tab>……リドルアナと書いてあるクポ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RINOK_000_638<tab>The lighthouse? Why would he write that, and in the old man's journal no less?
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RINOK_000_638リドルアナ大灯台のことかい？
なんだってあんなところへ？

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_639<tab>There is a place on the Valnard Sea, far to the south of Rabanastre, where the ocean tumbles into a gaping maw more than a malm across─the Ridorana Cataract.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_639ラバナスタから遥か南、バルナード海の海上に、
地獄へ続くと言われている巨大な穴「リドルアナ」があります。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_640<tab>Legend would have us believe that it is the entrance to the Hell of Water.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_640周囲の海水は巨大な瀑布となって穴に流れ込んでおり、
その海水がどうなるのかは誰も知りません。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_641<tab>Many a scholar seeking to prove otherwise has descended into the chasm─some even by airship─but not a one has returned.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_MIKOTO_000_641幾人もの勇気ある探検家が飛空艇を駆り、穴底を目指しましたが、
瀑布が起こす乱気流と、落下する大量の海水の「圧」により、
またたくまに墜落、帰還した者はひとりもいないそうです。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_650<tab>Tell me, is Ridorana truly as magnificent as they say? ...Hm? You have never been there? And there I was thinking you might have something to contribute.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_RAMZALEXENTALE_000_650リドルアナ大灯台とはいったいどんな所なんでしょう？
……って、に聞いても仕方ありませんよね。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_680<tab>I must admit to knowing little of Ridorana save that which Lady Mikoto shared with us. Before we expend valuable time and resources traveling to so remote a place, I must review my notes and see if there is any mention of the abyss.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_680イヴァリースとリドルアナ大灯台にどんな関連性があるのか、
正直なところ、私にはさっぱりだ。
灯台へ向かう前にデュライ白書を調べてみようと思う。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_681<tab>We shall send for you as soon as we learn aught of interest.
target:
TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_JENOMISLEXENTALE_000_681幸いにも彼らは私の手帳を返してくれたからね。
ラムザと共に確認を進めるので、
しばらく待っていてくれたまえ。

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_400<tab>
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_400<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_HURDY_000_401<tab>
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_HURDY_000_401<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_420<tab>
target: TEXT_STMBDI201_03089_LINAMEWRILAH_000_420<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
